Marketing Affiliation Management

Open your business to clients from different niches and geographies

Affiliation marketing is a proven method to increase your client base revenues. Often, affiliates reach new clientelle in niches available only to them. Give your affiliates the tools they need to succeed.

Customer Acquisition


Create and manage leads from multiple sources.
From email, spreadsheets and web forms, leads today come in almost any technical method. Broker Business Pro imports them all in a simple process, making sure no lead is lost.

Avoid data leaks
Your leads are worth gold. Security and provisioning mechanisms ensure access is highly limited, and information can be exported only by certain roles.

Follow up on leads with flexible reminding options
Never miss an opportunity to get the mindshare of your lead. Flexible reminder scheduling

Synchronize agents’ calendars with Google and Exchange
Get your managers and sales reps’ time managed while in the office and when meeting clients outside.

Fully branded correspondence
From simple emails to complex sales proposals, your entire communication is branded, projecting your professional image.

Track all client interactions
From email to phone call, every client interaction is recorded and easily retrieved for disputes, compliance and quality assurance purposes.




Steamlined Client Enrollment Process

Don't let lengthy processes stop your leads from converting.

Enrolling a client is considered to be the most complex process in the lifetime of the customer. Today’s strict regulation requires clients to fill multiple, cumbersome forms and provided a complex set of documents, including identity documentation, tax information and other declaration. It’s no secret that many brokers fail to onboard clients because of this lengthy process.


Translated Account opening documents and email templates.
Get rid of language barriers and create clear, simple to undersatand correspondence with your client.

Prefilled deposit forms, ready to be emailed to your client in a single click.
Have your clients deposit funds without having to fill lenghty documents.

Scheduled status updates that tell what’s missing from each applicant
Don't let potential accounts die in the registration process. Get notified daily about each new account and what's missing from onboarding the client.

Call clients with one click



Our built-in telephony system will connect with the client quickly, so agents can focus and bring new business.




Account Retension Tools

Keep your your hard-earned clients in house, upsell cross-sell to increase customer lifetime value and ensure that your loyal clientele stays with you. Broker Business Pro provides automatic mechanisms that take action when users’ activity patterns change, segmented clients are approached with promotions, and potential closing accounts are approached electronically and personally by Customer Service.


Find Non trading and low trading accounts
Time to engage dormant accounts! Make sure to communicate automatically, or in person, with accounts who have not traded for a while.

Find Winners and Losers
Did your client have an excellent trading day? Or perhaps a terrible one? Make sure your business is aware of this extreme day.

Support Tickets
Complete feedback, rants and raves, suggestions and comments system. Let your users express their thoughts and feelings about your operation.




Front Office Operations Management

Establish an omni channel customer service presence and turn customer interactions to revenue

Every customer contact is an opportunity, not only to fortify your brand but also generate revenues. Premium services help your clients trade faster and position your business as a top tier brokerage.


Take phone orders
Your clients can now trade by phone! And your sales team can extend this engagement by cross-selling and up-selling.

Track clients orders
Identify your top customers so you can advise them on more trades.

Monitor Trading volume
Identifying customer activity patterns helps the Sales team optimize human resources in order to maximize revenues at peak times.

Support Ticketing system
Let customers communicate via the Web using our customer support system and offer them promotions as part of this interaction.

VOIP integration
Capture every interaction, including telephone calls, right from your sales agents’ desktop
